title: How to Create Folders in Mac

steps.title: Right-click in an empty space on the desktop.
steps.content: Right-click in an empty space on the desktop. This will open a menu. You can also access the right-click menu by holding the Control key, and clicking normally, or two-finger clicking on a supported trackpad. [1] X Expert Source Yaffet Meshesha Computer Specialist Expert Interview. 10 February 2021

steps.title: Select New Folder.
steps.content: Select New Folder . This will create a new folder on your desktop. [2] X Expert Source Yaffet Meshesha Computer Specialist Expert Interview. 10 February 2021

steps.title: Click on an open space on your desktop.
steps.content: Click on an open space on your desktop. The menu bar at the top of the screen should now say Finder next to .

steps.title: Click on File in the menu bar.
steps.content: Click on File in the menu bar.

steps.title: Open Finder.
steps.content: Open Finder. To open Finder, click on in your dock.

steps.title: Click on Documents in the menu bar in the finder window.
steps.content: Click on Documents in the menu bar in the finder window.

steps.title: Right-click on an empty space in the Finder window.
steps.content: Right-click on an empty space in the Finder window.

steps.title: Select New Folder.
steps.content: Select New Folder . This will create a new folder in the active Finder window.
